Meal Planner

Add A Meal Schedule Login

What is Meal Planner?

Meal Planner is a simple assistant to help you schedule your meals.

  • To start, click the button below and register or log in using your email address.
  • Once you've done that, add a meal or two.
  • Then click on the schedule top at the top to view your weekly schedule.
  • From there you can also edit or delete meals that you've created.
  • When you're finished, click the logout button on the top right. Your schedule will be saved and ready for when you return.
